Skills are enhanced based on Adept Arts level. Landing combo finishers raises Arts level, 
and the level resets shortly after a skill is activated.

a combo finisher.

Allows Ares to temporarily join Katalina's attack when the Ares gauge is full. 
Perform a combo finisher, link attack, or skill to summon Ares.

Bull's Eye Blast charges faster depending on how high the Heat gauge is. 
Landing  attacks and link attacks fills the gauge.

Allows Rackam to fire 3-shot bursts by long-pressing . Burst-fire attacks deal
more damage when chained together with perfect timing.

Eugen can't move while in sniper vision, but he can manually aim his shots to
deal more damage.

Rosetta plants roses that attack foes within range. Roses level up as they hit foes, 
enhancing their capabilities.

Planted roses grant various buffs to the entire party whenever Rosetta uses a
combo finisher. The highest leveled rose determines effect strength.

Landing the final hit of a charged  attack summons one of Ferry's pets.
Performing a link attack summons all of her pets simultaneously.

attacks deal more damage based on how many pets are on the battlefield.

Sustaining rapid  attacks will eventually coat Lancelot's blades in ice,
allowing him to deal more damage.

Dodging an attack via + with perfect timing triggers a perfect dodge.
Lancelot can then launch into a combo after dodging.

Narmaya can switch between Dawnfly stance and Freeflutter stance. Her skills
and  attacks perform differently based on her stance.
